peril.views.slick

Interface EventListener


  • public interface EventListener
    Defines the behaviours of an object that when drawn on the Frame has specific actions to be performed when a certain event occurs to it.
    Since:
    2018-02-16
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Point, Frame

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buttonPress(int key, Point mouse)
      Processes a button press while the mouse is at the specified position on screen.
      void draw(Frame frame)
      Draws the sub elements of the parent object that this EventListener is coupled to.
      void mouseClick(Point mouse, int mouseButton)
      Process a mouse button click at a specified Point position on screen.
      void mouseHover(Point mouse)
      Process the mouse hovering at a certain Point position on screen.

    • Method Detail

      • mouseClick

        void mouseClick(Point mouse,
                int mouseButton)
        Process a mouse button click at a specified Point position on screen.
        Parameters:
        mouse - The mouse Point position.
        mouseButton - The mouse button that was clicked Input.

      • mouseHover

        void mouseHover(Point mouse)
        Process the mouse hovering at a certain Point position on screen.
        Parameters:
        mouse - The mouse position Point.

      • buttonPress

        void buttonPress(int key,
                 Point mouse)
        Processes a button press while the mouse is at the specified position on screen.
        Parameters:
        key - The key number
        mouse - The mouse Point
        See Also:
        Input

      • draw

        void draw(Frame frame)
        Draws the sub elements of the parent object that this EventListener is coupled to.
        Parameters:
        frame - The Frame the elements will be drawn on.
